name: Evil Never Dies (Sylver)
description:
An island paradise, a hotel-resort full of beauties, a position of responsibility managing it . . . What more could a recent college graduate ask for?

Although, not everything is as it seems . . . Take over and explore Hardic Resort and the surrounding island as you help determine the fate of those who work . . . in your care, while reconnecting with your old past.

Immerse yourself in solving the mysteries surrounding the resort and your household because . . .

Evil Never Dies!
